trans-unit.source: Supports a simple iteration over an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Suporta uma iteração simple através de um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators provide read-only access to the data in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumeradores fornecem acesso só de leitura aos dados numa coleção.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumeradores não podem ser utilizados para modificar a colecção subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, o enumerador está posicionado antes do primeiro elemento da coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> resets the enumerator to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A>Repõe o enumerador nesta posição.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: AT isto posicionar, chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, tem de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>para avançar o enumerador para o primeiro elemento da coleção de antes de ler o valor de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class inherits from <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe herda <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: See the class for more information about enumerating over a collection.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a classe para obter mais informações sobre a enumeração através de uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento actual o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Current does not move the position of the enumerator and consecutive calls to Current return the same object until either <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Atual não move a posição do enumerador e chamadas consecutivas para atual devolvem o mesmo objeto até ser <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>ou <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento atual no <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection or after the last element.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador está posicionado antes do primeiro elemento da colecção ou após o último elemento.

trans-unit.source: Advances the enumerator to the next element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Avança o enumerador para o elemento seguinte no <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method advances the enumerator to the next element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Este método avança o enumerador para o próximo elemento na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator> class inherits from <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>; see this class for more information on using enumerators.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator>classe herda <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>; Consulte esta classe para obter mais informações sobre como utilizar enumeradores.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o enumerador foi produzido com êxito para o próximo elemento; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o enumerador ter passado o fim da colecção.

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: A colecção foi modificada após o enumerador foi criado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define o enumerador a posição inicial, que é antes do primeiro elemento no <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador permanece válido desde que a coleção permanece inalterada.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or Reset throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Caso sejam feitas alterações à coleção, como adicionar, modificar ou eliminar elementos, o enumerador está irrevogavelmente inválido e a próxima chamada para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>ou a reposição emite um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: A colecção foi modificada após o enumerador foi criado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento actual o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A> does not move the position of the enumerator and consecutive calls to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A> return the same object until either <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>não move a posição do enumerador e chamadas consecutivas para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>devolver o mesmo objeto até ser <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>ou <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento atual no <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection or after the last element.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador está posicionado antes do primeiro elemento da colecção ou após o último elemento.
